name: Apparel and Accessories
description: Products including clothing, footwear, and fashion accessories for men, women, and children.

name: Beauty and Personal Care
description: Items related to skincare, haircare, cosmetics, and personal hygiene.

name: Consumer Electronics
description: Devices such as smartphones, tablets, laptops, and home entertainment systems.

name: Home Appliances
description: Large and small appliances for household use, including refrigerators, ovens, and vacuum cleaners.

name: Furniture and Home Decor
description: Products for furnishing and decorating homes, including furniture, lighting, and decorative items.

name: Food and Beverages
description: Consumables including groceries, snacks, beverages, and gourmet foods.

name: Health and Wellness
description: Products promoting health, including vitamins, supplements, and fitness equipment.

name: Automotive Products
description: Items related to vehicle maintenance, accessories, and parts.

name: Sports and Outdoor Equipment
description: Gear and apparel for sports, fitness, and outdoor activities.

name: Books and Stationery
description: Printed materials, office supplies, and educational resources.

name: Toys and Games
description: Entertainment products for children and adults, including toys, board games, and puzzles.

name: Pet Supplies
description: Products for pet care, including food, toys, and grooming items.

name: Jewelry and Watches
description: Luxury and fashion items including rings, necklaces, bracelets, and timepieces.

name: Travel and Luggage
description: Products for travel, including suitcases, backpacks, and travel accessories.

name: Home Improvement
description: Tools, materials, and supplies for home renovation and repair.

name: Gardening and Outdoor Living
description: Products for gardening, landscaping, and outdoor leisure activities.

name: Office Supplies and Equipment
description: Items for office use, including furniture, technology, and organizational tools.

name: Musical Instruments and Accessories
description: Instruments, sheet music, and related accessories for musicians.

name: Baby Products
description: Items for infants and toddlers, including clothing, toys, and care products.

name: Crafts and Hobbies
description: Materials and tools for various crafts, hobbies, and DIY projects.

name: Luxury Goods
description: High-end products including designer fashion, fine jewelry, and premium accessories.

name: Green and Eco-friendly Products
description: Sustainable and environmentally friendly consumer goods.

name: Seasonal Products
description: Items related to specific seasons or holidays, such as decorations and themed merchandise.

name: Footwear
description: Shoes, boots, and other types of footwear for various occasions and activities.

name: Eyewear
description: Prescription glasses, sunglasses, and related accessories.

name: Cleaning Supplies
description: Products for household cleaning and maintenance.

name: Pharmaceuticals
description: Over-the-counter medications and health-related products.

name: Digital Content and Media
description: Downloadable or streaming content including music, movies, and e-books.

name: Gourmet and Specialty Foods
description: High-quality, unique food items often sourced from specific regions or producers.

name: Alcoholic Beverages
description: Spirits, wines, and beers for retail sale.

name: Non-Alcoholic Beverages
description: Soft drinks, juices, and other non-alcoholic beverages.

name: Kitchenware
description: Utensils, cookware, and other products for kitchen use.

name: Stationery and Office Supplies
description: Products for writing, organizing, and office work.
